title: No. 4 Tech drops series opener to TCU - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: No. 4 Tech drops series opener to TCU - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: FORT WORTH, Texas – No. 4 Texas Tech fell 7-4 on Thursday night to TCU at Lupton Stadium. The Red Raiders were outscored 7-2 over the final four-and-a-half innings in the loss.
